Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Brooklyn Bridge Automated Pedestrian Counts Demonstration Project

    DOT is testing automated technology to count pedestrians. The counter is located on the Manhattan approach of the Brooklyn Bridge.

    Brooklyn Borough President Meeting Requests

    This data set represents all meeting and event requests (internal and external) to the Borough President for 2017 and 2018.
